name: explosive fly
description:
Game genre :             2d endless hypercasual game

Game theme :            fairy and Dragons 

- GamePlay consist of shooting dragons (by colliding them with fairy) in order to burst the dragon shells  , which makes dragons fall and get killed, for each dragon killed single score is gained.

- Obstacles : fireballs are instantiated from which the fairy is needed to be protected. , if it collides with it then one Life is loosed.    ( 3 Lives are provided) .

- power Ups   is provided once in a gameplay.
- game begins with a basic story line and how to play tutorial.

* MOVES AND CONTROLS  

 - Single joyStick move which makes the fairy move upwards and downwards.
